abstract: Jere Longman On Soccer column holds that chaos during Gold Cup semifinal match between Mexico and Panama illustrates Concacaf's lack of integrity and public confidence; notes that referee made several questionable decisions, players threatened their opponents and fans hurled debris onto the field.
lead_paragraph: After a chaotic and disgraceful Gold Cup match, a statement of disgust from the Panama team illustrated Concacaf’s lack of public confidence.

headline.main: Messy Mexico-Panama Semifinal Leaves a Stain on Concacaf
headline.print_headline: Messy Match Leaves a Stain on Concacaf

snippet: After a chaotic and disgraceful Gold Cup match, a statement of disgust from the Panama team illustrated Concacaf’s lack of public confidence.

keywords.value: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
keywords.name: organizations
